name: Tempo Mile
cues: Start from an easy run and build smoothly into tempo pace over ~30 seconds
Maintain a quick, efficient cadence and tall posture
Breathe rhythmically (in 3–4 steps, out 3–4 steps) and avoid redlining
Finish strong but controlled; you should be able to repeat another repeat with similar quality after rest
safety: Skip or reduce intensity if any joint pain (ankle, knee, hip) or if form deteriorates. Prefer flat or gently rolling terrain; avoid steep hills for tempo repeats.
